front.title: •Obi-Wan With Lightsaber
front.gametext: Permanent weapon is •Obi-Wan's Lightsaber (may target a character or creature for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).
front.lore: 'The Force will be with you... always.'

combo: Obi-Wan With Lightsaber + Obi-Wan's Cape Makes Obi-Wan immune to attrition < 5.
Obi-Wan With Lightsaber + A Jedi's Resilience
Obi-Wan With Lightsaber + Krayt Dragon Howl
